price: Les he revelado la palabra para que reflexionen.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ وَصَّلۡنَا لَهُمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad waṣṣalnā lahumu al-qawla laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
